property.name: demo.server.port
property.description: Port where you can access the demo user interface (will need to forward on VM)

property.name: demo.ambari.username
property.description: Username for user with admin access to Ambari

property.name: demo.ambari.password
property.description: Username for user with admin access to Ambari

property.name: demo.data.configuration
property.description: JSON data descriptor for defining random data generation
